articles.description: The CW Supernatural spinoff show premieres on October 11 but creator Ackles was there to introduce the cast playing his parents, Meg Donnelly and Drake Rodger, and reveal how The Winchesters connects to Supernatural.
articles.content: Aquarian stars, missing fathers, bunkers, and flirtatious coffee orders abound in the pilot for The CWs Supernatural prequel The Winchesters, which focuses on young versions of Sam and Deans parents.… [+3722 chars]
